entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 26.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Becoming partly cloudy this evening. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light early this evening. Low minus 26. Wind chill minus 33 this evening and minus 38 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Mainly cloudy. High minus 21.

entry.title: Monday night: Periods of light snow. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the evening. Wind southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming southwest 20 in the evening. Temperature rising to minus 17 by morning. Wind chill near minus 30. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Sunday 12 February 2023
